section1.titulo: HAVE A GUIDE TO SHAPE YOUR SOFT SKILLS

section2.descricao: With professional environment simulations, you can grow! Boost your soft skills in an easy and fun way.

section3.descricao: How about an avatar that matches your personality? Buildar offers options for each user's unique characteristics.

section4.descricao: Paying to learn? Only if you want! Here we have a 100% free option for those who are interested.

section5.subtitulo: Here, it's not just about practicing
section5.descricao: Inspiring events, immersive gamification, meaningful achievements... Buildar is much more!

section6.descricao: If you want an even more immersive experience, here are some paths.

section7.descricao: Want more? Buildar features a system for promoting events and workshops for a great exchange of experiences.

section8.subtitulo: And what are people saying about Buildar?

depoimentos.userNilvan: With fun and challenging games, I am certain it will grab the attention of young people and prepare them well for their future and corporate environment.
depoimentos.userDiogo: I loved Buildar's platform! I found it amazing to be able to play and at the same time learn and develop skills.
depoimentos.userBraz: Buildar was fundamental for the development of my soft skills through the incredible games offered by the platform. Thanks to this, I successfully entered the job market.
depoimentos.userHelen: When I discovered Buildar, I started imagining how it would have helped me in the past with my soft skills, for developing them and even for job interviews.
depoimentos.userRyan: Buildar's platform is simply fantastic! It helped me a lot in developing my soft skills. I love the games and the capybara.
depoimentos.userLilian: I have never seen such a creative learning idea. Buildar is proof that everything we learn can be fun, out-of-the-box, and can change our professional and personal lives. I highly recommend it!
depoimentos.userLais: The platform changed my perception of communication and personal relationships. I used to have a lot of difficulty communicating, but now I see myself improving every day, learning in a fun way!
depoimentos.userGabi: Buildar is extremely important nowadays, where so many young people, like me, seek to better develop their soft skills. It's been amazing how the platform has helped me improve my behavioral skills in such a light and fun way.
depoimentos.userMartinha: The platform offers clear, interactive, and gamified paths, making the learning process intuitive and engaging. I recommend it!

cenaInicial.texto3: Here you will put your behavioral skills into practice.
cenaInicial.texto4: On your right, there are doors to train your skills.
cenaInicial.texto5: And on your left, you can relax with a simple game. Feel free to explore.

npc2.texto2: I do a lot of activities every day.
npc2.texto3: But sometimes I feel like I don't have enough time for anything.
npc2.texto4: Or maybe I just don't manage my time well... (๑•́ ₃ •̀๑)

npc3.texto1: I am developing my time management skills as fast as a <anim>Katchauuuu!</anim> (/＾▽＾)/

npc4.texto1: I’m managing my time well, but I think I can improve (´・v・`)

npc5.texto1: Oh, pupil, I think I'm in the same boat...
npc5.texto2: But ohhh, watch out for the improprieties. (◕‿↼)

npc6.texto1: Hi, you're the new intern, right?
npc6.texto2: By the way, have you ever heard about the Dialogue?
npc6.texto3: No? Hmm, I'll introduce it to you one of these days. (◔‿◔)

porta2.texto2: I better explore the place a little more for now.

carlosExperience: My experience at Buildar was transformative. Several times, while I was at work, I remembered an activity that I trained on the platform.

acceptanceOfTermsDescription: By accessing and using our platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, do not use the platform.
descriptionOfServicesDescription: Our platform offers tools and resources to help young people develop their soft skills through gamification. Users can participate in activities, games, and challenges designed to improve skills such as communication, teamwork, leadership, problem-solving, among others.
registrationAndUserAccountDescription: To access certain features of the platform, you may need to create an account. By creating an account, you agree to provide true, accurate, current, and complete information about yourself as requested by the registration form.
useOfPlatformDescription: You agree to use the platform only for purposes permitted by (a) these Terms of Use and (b) any laws, regulations, or generally accepted practices in the relevant jurisdictions. You agree not to access (or attempt to access) any of the Services by any means other than through the interface provided by the platform, unless you have been specifically allowed to do so in a separate agreement.
userContentDescription: By submitting content to the platform, you grant our platform a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, sublicensable, and transferable license to use, reproduce, distribute, prepare derivative works, display, and perform that content in connection with the provision of the services.
privacyDescription: Your privacy is important to us. Please read our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
modificationsToTermsDescription: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time. Changes will be effective from the posting on the platform. It is your responsibility to periodically review the Terms of Use to be aware of any modifications.
limitationOfLiabilityDescription: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, in no event will our platform be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.
terminationDescription: We may terminate or suspend your access to our platform immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including, without limitation, if you breach the Terms of Use.
generalProvisionsDescription: These Terms of Use constitute the entire agreement between you and our platform and govern the use of the Services, superseding any prior agreements between you and our platform. If any provision of these Terms of Use is held to be invalid, the remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect.
contactDescription: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us at: suporte@buildarsoftskills.com.
platformUsageAgreement: By using our platform, you agree to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any of the terms mentioned, please do not use our platform.
becomeSpeaker: Be a volunteer speaker at Buildar
workExperiences: How about sharing your work experiences? Access the form and come Buildar with us.
subject: Subject
spendLessEnergy: Spend less energy for each activity, at the cost of a stopwatch that accompanies you during activities.
readyToActUnderPressure: Are you ready to act under time pressure?
question: Question
procrastinationGoodStrategy: Procrastination is a good strategy for time management.
planDayNightBefore: Planning the day the night before can improve productivity.
multitaskingIncreasesEfficiency: Multitasking increases the efficiency and quality of work.
settingRealisticDeadlines: Setting realistic deadlines helps to avoid unnecessary stress.
breaksDuringDayEssential: Having breaks during the day is essential to maintain productivity.
workingMoreHours: Working more hours directly results in more productivity.
creativityOnlyForArtisticJobs: Creativity is only necessary for artistic jobs.
empathyImportantInLeadership: Empathy is an important skill in leadership.
nonVerbalCommunication: Non-verbal communication does not affect the effectiveness of communication.
dailyReadingBeneficial: Daily reading is beneficial only to improve writing skills.
emotionalIntelligenceImpact: Emotional intelligence has an impact on the effectiveness of leadership.
almostScore1: Ah, it was close! You got
almostScore2: out of 5. Shall we try again?
lowScore: Almost! We just need to practice more together. We won't give up, okay?
descriptionCommunication: Enhanced team communication skills, promoting collaboration and mutual understanding.
descriptionManagementOfAges: Completed the Routine in Time Management module in an unbroken sequence of 7 days.
descriptionTheHourOfTruth: Completed the Challenge Mode: No Time Brother without running out of time during an entire module.
descriptionLearningToBuild: Completed all the doors of a module for the first time.
descriptionSuccessfulLeader: Successfully led a project from start to finish, achieving exceptional results.
restQuestion: WHAT DO YOU THINK ABOUT TAKING A BREAK?
runViviDescription: Run Vivi! In this game you control the fearless capybara towards a successful future.
capQuizDescription: How about testing your knowledge beyond the doors? In this game, practice doesn't stop.
gameUnderConstructionDescription: What a pity! This game is still under development...
originBuildar: But after all... Where did Buildar come from?
foundedBy: Founded by a group of teenagers, web development students, Buildar takes shape as a graduation project. Forged on the pillars of companionship, and determination, Buildar continues to shape the future of other young people like its founders.
ourPurpose: And what have we come to do here?
buildarCommitment: Buildar is not here for nothing! We have a great commitment to make you conquer your future.
orientYouth: Guide the young to enter the job market through the practice of soft skills.
platformGoal: To be the number 1 web platform in the practice and development of soft skills among young people.
futurePlans: Plans for the future? Buildar is a master at that. Check out just a few of our closest goals
researchPoints: The research points out... That's where we're going! Buildar exists to solve the harsh reality of young people in the market.
youthMarketEntry: 3 to 4 young people cannot enter the job market due to lack of soft skills.
youthSurvey: In authorial surveys, 89% of young people did not learn about soft skills earlier.
fewEnvironments: There are few accessible environments for young people to practice soft skills.
userNilvan: With fun and highly challenging games, I am absolutely certain that it will capture the attention of young people and equip them very well for both their future and their corporate environment.
userDiogo: I loved the Buildar platform! I simply found it incredible to be able to play and learn while developing skills.
userBraz: Buildar was essential for the development of my soft skills, thanks to the amazing games available on the platform. As a result, I successfully entered the job market.
userHelen: When I met Buildar, I started to imagine how it would have helped me in the past with my soft skills, to help me develop them, and even in job interviews.
userRyan: The Buildar platform is simply fantastic! It helped me a lot in developing my soft skills. I love the games and the capybara.
userLilian: I've never seen such a creative learning idea. Buildar is proof that everything we learn can be fun, out of the box, and can change our professional and personal life. I highly recommend it!
userLais: The platform made me change my perception about communication and personal relationships. I had a lot of difficulty communicating, but today I see that I am being renewed every day, learning in a fun way!
userGabi: Buildar is of extreme importance these days, where so many young people, like me, seek to better develop their soft skills. It has been incredible how the platform has helped me improve my behavioral skills in such a light and fun way.
userMartinha: The platform offers clear, interactive and gamified trails, making the learning process intuitive and engaging. I recommend!
